meanings.definition: Awkward or clumsy in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: She felt gawkish as she tripped over her own feet.
meanings.sent2: The gawkish boy bumped into the table, spilling his drink.
meanings.sent3: Despite her best efforts, her gawkish dance moves drew laughter from the crowd.
meanings.sent4: His gawkish attempts at flirting made everyone cringe.
meanings.sent5: The gawkish penguin waddled clumsily across the ice.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of sophistication or social grace.
meanings.sent1: The gawkish outfit she wore to the party stood out for all the wrong reasons.
meanings.sent2: His gawkish manners at the formal dinner shocked the other guests.
meanings.sent3: The gawkish attempt at fine dining ended with spaghetti on the ceiling.
meanings.sent4: Her gawkish behavior in the art gallery made the security guard suspicious.
meanings.sent5: The gawkish painting hung crookedly on the wall, drawing puzzled looks from visitors.
